titles.title: Small Business Growth and Investment Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust the limits on expensing of certain depreciable business assets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/28/2014--Introduced. Small Business Growth and Investment Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase: (1) the expensing allowance for depreciable business property to $250,000 for taxable years beginning after 2013, and (2) the threshold level for such property over which the expensing allowance is reduced to $800,000.
